keyMappings:
map h goBack
map l goForward
map H previousTab
map L nextTab
map <c-p> togglePinTab
map <c-j> scrollLeft
map <c-k> scrollRight
map <c-J> scrollToLeft
map <c-K> scrollToRight
map <c-d> scrollDown
map <c-e> scrollUp
map J scrollFullPageDown
map K scrollFullPageUp
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map <c-F> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <c-f> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map D LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map ch closeTabsOnLeft
map cl closeTabsOnRight
map C closeOtherTabs
unmap u
unmap zH
unmap zL
unmap <a-p>
unmap <a-f>
unmap <c-y>
searchEngines:
w: http://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
y: http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
gi: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&tbm=isch Google Images
gx: https://clients2.google.com/service/update2/crx?response=redirect&prodversion=73.0.3683.75&acceptformat=crx2,crx3&x=id%3D%s%26uc Chrome Extensions
gd: https://drive.google.com/drive/search?q=%s Google Drive
c: http://caniuse.com/#search=%s CanIUse?
a: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s/ref=nb_sb_noss?url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=%s Amazon Prime
p: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s/ref=nb_sb_noss_2?url=search-alias%3Dinstant-video&field-keywords=%s Prime Video
n: https://www.netflix.com/search?q=%s Netflix
d: https://decider.com/movie/%s/ Decider (hyphenated keyword search)
r: https://www.reddit.com/search/?q=%s Reddit
rr: https://www.reddit.com/r/%s Reddit (Subreddit)
pt: https://www.powerthesaurus.org/%s/synonyms Power Thesaurus
imdb: https://www.imdb.com/find?q=%s&ref_=nv_sr_sm imdb
ja: http://www.gavo.t.u-tokyo.ac.jp/ojad/search/index/sortprefix:accent/narabi1:kata_asc/narabi2:accent_asc/narabi3:mola_asc/yure:visible/curve:invisible/details:invisible/limit:20/word:%s OJAD
rz: https://www.rhymezone.com/r/rhyme.cgi?Word=%s&typeofrhyme=adv&org1=syl&org2=l&org3=y Rhyme Zone
